description: The Isle of Man's chief constable warns that a rise in violent crime is "directly linked" to drugs.
title: Isle of Man faces 'increasing threat' from drug crime
title_page: Isle of Man faces 'increasing threat' from drug crime - BBC News
maintext: Mr Roberts said despite the rise, the island remained the "safest" of the British Isles as the violence did not affect "ordinary, law-abiding people".
